definition.name: Codecov Test Result Action
definition.description: GitHub Action that uploads test result reports for your repository to codecov.io
definition.author: Codecov

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: Repository Codecov token. Used to authorize report uploads

inputs.name: binary
inputs.description: The file location of a pre-downloaded version of the CLI. If specified, integrity checking will be bypassed.

inputs.name: codecov_yml_path
inputs.description: Specify the path to the Codecov YML

inputs.name: commit_parent
inputs.description: Override to specify the parent commit SHA

inputs.name: directory
inputs.description: Directory to search for test result reports.

inputs.name: disable_search
inputs.description: Disable search for test result files. This is helpful when specifying what files you want to upload with the --file option.

inputs.name: dry_run
inputs.description: Don't upload files to Codecov

inputs.name: env_vars
inputs.description: Environment variables to tag the upload with (e.g. PYTHON | OS,PYTHON)

inputs.name: exclude
inputs.description: Folders to exclude from search

inputs.name: fail_ci_if_error
inputs.description: Specify whether or not CI build should fail if Codecov runs into an error during upload

inputs.name: file
inputs.description: Path to test result file to upload

inputs.name: files
inputs.description: Comma-separated list of files to upload

inputs.name: flags
inputs.description: Flag upload to group test results (e.g. py3.10 | py3.11 | py3.12)

inputs.name: handle_no_reports_found
inputs.description: Raise no exceptions when no test result reports found

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: User defined upload name. Visible in Codecov UI

inputs.name: os
inputs.description: Override the assumed OS. Options are linux | macos | windows.

inputs.name: override_branch
inputs.description: Specify the branch name

inputs.name: override_build
inputs.description: Specify the build number

inputs.name: override_build_url
inputs.description: The URL of the build where this is running

inputs.name: override_commit
inputs.description: Specify the commit SHA

inputs.name: override_pr
inputs.description: Specify the pull request number

inputs.name: report_code
inputs.description: The code of the report. If unsure, do not include

inputs.name: root_dir
inputs.description: Used when not in git/hg project to identify project root directory

inputs.name: slug
inputs.description: Specify the slug manually (Enterprise use)

inputs.name: url
inputs.description: Specify the base url to upload (Enterprise use)

inputs.name: use_oidc
inputs.description: Use OIDC to authenticate with Codecov

inputs.name: verbose
inputs.description: Specify whether the Codecov output should be verbose

inputs.name: version
inputs.description: Specify which version of the Codecov CLI should be used. Defaults to `latest`

inputs.name: working-directory
inputs.description: Directory in which to execute codecov.sh
